item.title: 旋转图像
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 旋转图像 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/rotate-image/ 没难度的中等题，这方法很python class Solution: def rotate(self, matrix: List[List[int]]) -> None: """ Do not return anything, modify matrix in-place instead. """ n = len(matrix) for i in list(map(list,map(reversed,zip(*matrix)))): matrix.append(i) del matrix[:n]
